title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 111 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 111 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。我要在正直人的大会中，并公会中，一心称谢耶和华。

lineList.en: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的作为本为大。凡喜爱的都必考察。

lineList.en: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 他所行的是尊荣和威严。他的公义存到永远。

lineList.en: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
lineList.cn: 他行了奇事，使人记念。耶和华有恩惠，有怜悯。

lineList.en: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
lineList.cn: 他赐粮食给敬畏他的人。他必永远记念他的约。

lineList.en: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
lineList.cn: 他向百姓显出大能的作为，把外邦的地赐给他们为业。

lineList.en: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.
lineList.cn: 他手所行的，是诚实公平。他的训词都是确实的。

lineList.en: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.
lineList.cn: 是永永远远坚定的，是按诚实正直设立的。

lineList.en: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.
lineList.cn: 他向百姓施行救赎，命定他的约，直到永远。他的名圣而可畏。

lineList.en: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 敬畏耶和华是智慧得开端。凡遵行。他命令的，便是聪明人。耶和华是永远当赞美的。
